dict.acceptation: 脚本，手迹；书写体铅字；剧本、广播稿或者电影剧本；
为电影（或戏剧等）写剧本；编造；

sent.orig: At the begin of the script directly after the initial block of comment.
sent.trans: 放在最初的解释模块后面，script的起始部分。

sent.orig: Meanwhile, kai calligraphy (regular script) and xing calligraphy (semi cursive script) also appeared and developed rapidly.
sent.trans: 同时，楷书和行书也出现并快速发展起来。

sent.orig: East Palace, West Palace has 3 version, stage play script, film script and fiction.
sent.trans: 《东宫西宫》共有三个版本，舞台剧本、电影剧本、小说。

sent.orig: Specifies a script for the page that is interpreted by a script engine.
sent.trans: 指定由脚本引擎解释的页面中的脚本。

sent.orig: The official script in calligraphy is a transition between seal character, and regular script.
sent.trans: 隶体是书法从篆体到楷体的过渡。
